comments.author: KathyF
comments.content: I brought back a couple from Rome, and made a white lasagna, but had to fill in with dried when one of the mushrooms didn't make it. It's a little daunting, having such a huge mushroom to work with, but it cooks down quite a bit.

comments.author: Melek Ozgur - Turkey
comments.content: we have these fungi in our forest tones of them ! we have a better and more tasty one and this one is not so favorable.Lactarius salmonicolor is the most favorable one in most of my country. I am so surprised seeing this mushroom classified as second class taste with 1000 eur price tag !

comments.author: Roger
comments.content: Melek--given European numerical preferences (the comma is used where the US uses a decimal point), I suspect that was 10 euros, not 1000 Euros.
